strapiPost.title: Outdoor Track & Field NCAA West Preliminary Rounds Start Today
strapiPost.content:
The Razorback Outdoor Track and Field NCAA West Preliminary Rounds start today at John McDonnell Field on the University of Arkansas campus and go through Saturday, May 28. 

  • Round 1-2: There will be 117 institutions competing in the rounds this week, the first two of the NCAA Championships. The top 12 in each event will advance to the semifinal and final, held in Oregon in June.
  • Events: The Razorbacks will have 49 (Women & Men) entries in the regional field with 45 athletes competing in 36 events. The events with Razorback entries include a 100m(W), 400m(W), 800m(W&M), 1,500m(W), 5,000m(W&M), 10,000m(M), pole vault(W), 110m hurdles(M), long jump(M), and hammer(M). 

Get tickets HERE.
